Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: There is strong evidence that UnitedHealth Group maintains human oversight and accountability in AI operations. Their public documents specify that AI assists but does not replace human clinical judgment and that oversight mechanisms are in place.

summary.overallFindings: UnitedHealth Group demonstrates comprehensive and concrete responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, supported by detailed public artifacts. The company provides clear evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments, including audit readiness. No significant gaps were identified, reflecting a mature and well-documented approach to responsible AI.
